translations: n．矿石烧结物：通过烧结过程形成的矿石固体，通常用于冶金工业。
· The production of sinters is an important step in the steelmaking process.
矿石烧结物的生产是钢铁制造过程中的一个重要步骤。

sentences.sentence: Hardness is one of the main characters of ultrahard material sinters.
sentences.translation: 硬度是衡量超硬材料烧结体的主要特性之一。

sentences.sentence: The metallurgical performance of sinters can meet the requirement of BF smelting.
sentences.translation: 该烧结矿的冶金性能能基本满足高炉冶炼的要求。

sentences.sentence: The reason that fuel addition manner affects the MPS sinters quality is clarified;
sentences.translation: 弄清了燃料添加方式对小球团烧结矿质量影响的原因；
